author: Natalia Drozdiak, Aoife White
title: Europe's Tech Czar Says Strict Rules Will Build Public Trust in AI
description: Margrethe Vestager has support from Google and Facebook in her quest to make European citizens feel safe in the digital world.
content:
Margrethe Vestager during an interview in her Brussels office on Feb. 25.
Margrethe Vestager, once Silicon Valley’s top foe, may turn into its best ally by pushing for the tighter oversight that Big Tech says it needs to be saved from itself.
As European Un… [+4580 chars]
